page.title: 14LIFE STYLES - HOLT WORCS
page.content: This is a prospering community and is law abiding. A large percentage of the populace live in family groups in good permanent housing depending upon 20th century utilities e.g. electricity, piped water, drainage and santitation systems, radio, T.V. telephones and motor cars. Clothes, although not unfasionable are practical as befits a country life. The Village Hall and public houses serve as communal meeting places but some entertaining is done in the home. Use is made of a mobile library but cultural pursuits have to be followed in neighbouring towns.
